meanings.definition: In a manner consistent with the teachings of the Bible.
meanings.sent1: She prayed biblically before every meal.
meanings.sent2: He studied biblically to understand the scripture better.
meanings.sent3: The cat sat biblically in front of the open Bible, as if contemplating its teachings.
meanings.sent4: The old tree swayed biblically in the wind, as if echoing the wisdom of the Bible.
meanings.sent5: The choir sang biblically, their voices harmonizing like verses from the Bible.

meanings.definition: According to the principles or beliefs found in the Bible.
meanings.sent1: The biblically inspired artwork adorned the church walls.
meanings.sent2: She followed a biblically based diet to align with her faith.
meanings.sent3: The biblically themed party had guests dressed as famous biblical characters.
meanings.sent4: His actions were as solid and unwavering as a biblically built foundation.
meanings.sent5: The garden was a biblically beautiful paradise, with flowers blooming like verses from the Bible.
